resources.string:
- This will be a ListView filled by the available songs.
 - When clicked the song will be added to the current playlist 
 - The track, album and favorite button select the songs bases on these catacories 
 - An ArrayAdapter will fill this space to keep the system requirements low. 
 - The searchbutton will inflate a searchfield.

- This will be a ListView filled with the current playlist. 
 - The user will be able to change the order of the songs listed in here. 
 - An ArrayAdapter will fill this space to keep the system requirements low.
- This Activity will hold the information on the current song. \n - It will allow the user to control the playback style. e.g shuffle, repeat, repeat all. \n
